column5: hey yall, i just picked up a shimano callisto baitcaster. pretty good reel, it says its line capacity max is for 14 lb line, now ive heard a lot of ppl using braid in 30, 40, 50 lb, can i spool this reel up with that kind of line? Also have any of u noticed when u buy a reel and starting reeling its not always smooth. I hear like its touching something...
hey how it the reel i might buy one next year i need a new setup

I have one and I really like it. For the price you pay, its pretty good. I have mine spooled with 30lb braid and 14lb mono backing. Works great.  As for the grinding sound, not sure, mine is still smooth after a year of use.
Hey Nigel, i have not tried it out yet, gotta buy some braid...  thnx Rich
